an9.72:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kamesu avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho.
an9.72:1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kamesu avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
an9.72:1.5: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, ayam pathamo cetasovinibandho.
an9.72:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye avitarago hoti …pe…
an9.72:2.3: yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutto viharati …
an9.72:2.4: annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti.
an9.72:2.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
an9.72:2.6: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, ayam pancamo cetasovinibandho.
an9.72:3.1: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam cetasovinibandhanam pahanaya cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba.
an9.72:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
an9.72:3.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
an9.72:3.7: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam cetasovinibandhanam pahanaya ime cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba”ti.
